alert.note: Alert for Marion; McPherson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 9:49AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern McPherson and northwestern Marion Counties through 1015 AM CDT... At 949 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Durham, or 10 miles northeast of Canton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lincolnville, Ramona, Durham, Tampa, Lost Springs, Pilsen, Roxbury and Marion Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
